mapper.insert:
insert into t_sim_match_temp_summary_1201 (jobid, fspbm, item_count, total_amount) values
(#{r.jobid}, #{r.fspbm}, #{r.itemCount}, #{r.totalAmount})
mapper.select: select jobid, fspbm, item_count as itemCount, total_amount as totalAmount from t_sim_match_temp_summary_1201 where jobid = #{jobid} order by item_count asc, total_amount asc
